data.system_settings: Firefox v61.0.2 (64-bit) browser, Windows 10.0.17134 b.17134 Home
data.actual_result: The sidebar has a white column of pixels between the scroll bar and channels.
data.expected_result: The sidebar should be fully dark grey, not with a white bar interrupting the layout.
data.short_description: On the latest stable Firefox version, a white column of pixels appears always on the left sidebar at normal zoom (100%).
data.steps_to_repro: - Launch Firefox v61.0.2 (64-bit) - Go to the canary web-app and observe the screen
